pickpack_configname_combined.label: Show which value for configurable product names?

pickpack_configname_attribute_combined.label: Attribute to use as product name

pickpack_shelving.label: Shelving attribute
pickpack_shelving.comment: Attribute code for shelving info; eg. shelf

pickpack_options_filter.label: Filter out these custom option SKUs :
pickpack_options_filter.comment: Comma-separated list of SKUs to *not* show

pickpack_options_count_filter.label: Don't count these custom option SKUs :
pickpack_options_count_filter.comment: Comma-separated list of SKUs to *not* show a count for

pickpack_stock_combined.label: Show stock alert below...
pickpack_stock_combined.comment: Shows SKU in red if stock below this number

pickpack_company_address.label: Company address
pickpack_company_address.comment: Goes on the right of the header logo

pickpack_title.label: Custom page title
pickpack_title.comment: Goes next to the order number; eg. 'Order' or 'Packing Sheet'

pickpack_return_address_yn.label: Add return address?
pickpack_return_address_yn.comment: Goes at page base - good for integrated labels

pickpack_returnaddress.label: Nudge return address
pickpack_returnaddress.comment: Position the addresses exactly - for integrated labels

pickpack_bottom_shipping_address_yn.label: Add shipping address at bottom?
pickpack_bottom_shipping_address_yn.comment: Goes at page base - good for integrated labels

custom_message.label: Under product-list message
custom_message.comment: Good for tax numbers, return instructions

custom_message_filter.label: Show 'Message B' for this group :
custom_message_filter.comment: eg. put 'wholesale', then only wholesale customers will see 'Message B'

custom_messageB.label: Under product-list Message B
custom_messageB.comment: For any customer group containing filter word

notes_filter.label: Filter text (don't show notes containg this text)
notes_filter.comment: Eg. enter 'Captured amount' to not show authorize.net payments

notes_nudge.label: Nudge order notes
notes_nudge.comment: Position the order notes box exactly

packed_by_yn.label: Show 'Packed by' note?
packed_by_yn.comment: Goes at page base - handy for QC

shipment_details_yn.label: Show extra shipping details?
shipment_details_yn.comment: Puts in total weight, shipping carrier, payment method

shipment_details_custgroup_filter.label: Hide these groups :
shipment_details_custgroup_filter.comment: Comma-separated list of customer group names where you don't want the group name shown

pack_configname.label: Show which value for configurable product names?

shelving_real.label: Shelving attribute
shelving_real.comment: Attribute code for shelving info; eg. shelf

tax_col_yn.label: Show tax for each product (tax column)?

tax_line_or_subtotal.label: Add tax to line subtotal or order subtotal?

discount_line_or_subtotal.label: Show discounted prices on line item or order subtotal?
discount_line_or_subtotal.comment: Show on line item can help reduce customs fees

pickpack_company_address.label: Company address
pickpack_company_address.comment: Goes on the right of the header logo

pickpack_title.label: Custom page title
pickpack_title.comment: Goes next to the order number; eg. 'Order' or 'Invoice'

pickpack_return_address_yn.label: Add return address?
pickpack_return_address_yn.comment: Goes at page base - good for integrated labels

pickpack_returnaddress.label: Nudge return address
pickpack_returnaddress.comment: Position the addresses exactly - for integrated labels

pickpack_bottom_shipping_address_yn.label: Add shipping address at bottom?
pickpack_bottom_shipping_address_yn.comment: Goes at page base - good for integrated labels

custom_message.label: Under product-list message
custom_message.comment: Good for tax numbers, return instructions

custom_message_filter.label: Show 'Message B' for this group :
custom_message_filter.comment: eg. put 'wholesale', then only wholesale customers will see 'Message B'

custom_messageB.label: Under product-list Message B
custom_messageB.comment: For any customer group containing filter word

notes_filter.label: Filter text (don't show notes containg this text)
notes_filter.comment: Eg. enter 'Captured amount' to not show authorize.net payments

notes_nudge.label: Nudge order notes
notes_nudge.comment: Position the order notes box exactly

packed_by_yn.label: Show 'Packed by' note?
packed_by_yn.comment: Goes at page base - handy for QC

shipment_details_yn.label: Show extra shipping details?
shipment_details_yn.comment: Puts in total weight, shipping carrier, payment method

shipment_details_custgroup_filter.label: Hide these groups :
shipment_details_custgroup_filter.comment: Comma-separated list of customer group names where you don't want the group name shown

pack_configname.label: Show which value for configurable product names?

shelving_real.label: Shelving attribute
shelving_real.comment: Attribute code for shelving info; eg. shelf

tax_line_or_subtotal.label: Add tax to line subtotal or order subtotal?

discount_line_or_subtotal.label: Show discounted prices on line item or order subtotal?
discount_line_or_subtotal.comment: 'Show on line item' can help reduce customs fees

pickpack_configname_separated.label: Show which value for product names?

pickpack_configname_attribute_separated.label: Attribute to use as product name

pickpack_shelving_separated.label: Shelving attribute
pickpack_shelving_separated.comment: Attribute code for shelving info; eg. shelf

separated_options_filter.label: Filter out these custom option SKUs :
separated_options_filter.comment: Comma-separated list of SKUs to *not* show

separated_options_count_filter.label: Don't count these custom option SKUs :
separated_options_count_filter.comment: Comma-separated list of SKUs to *not* show a count for

pickpack_stock_separated.label: Show stock alert below...
pickpack_stock_separated.comment: Shows SKU in red if stock below this number

stock_stock.label: Show stock alert below...
stock_stock.comment: Shows item if stock below this; default = 1

pickpack_shelving_stock.label: Shelving attribute
pickpack_shelving_stock.comment: Attribute code for shelving info; eg. shelf

font_color_label.label: Address label : Color
font_color_label.comment: Blank = Black (enter any HTML color name)

label_logo_yn2.label: Add logo image behind address?
label_logo_yn2.comment: Put your logo behind the address

label_logo.label: Logo image behind address label
label_logo.comment: Dimensions : save this image as 'Label width' x 'Label height' @ 150dpi : .png works best

label_nudgelogo.label: Nudge label logo image
label_nudgelogo.comment: This will move the image on each label

label_nudgelogo_text.label: Nudge address text
label_nudgelogo_text.comment: This will move the address text : eg. put your image left-side of the address with an X-nudge

label_return_address_yn.label: Add return address?
label_return_address_yn.comment: Adds one per order, for separate return address label

font_color_return_label.label: Return Address Label : Color
font_color_return_label.comment: Blank = Black (enter any HTML color name)

pickpack_tickbox.label: 'Tick boxes' next to item SKUs?
pickpack_tickbox.comment: This can help your packers item-pick and box-pack

shelvingpos.label: Position of shelving info
shelvingpos.comment: Where to show the shelving attribute on the pick lists

shelving_nudge.label: Nudge shelving
shelving_nudge.comment: (Used if 'Position of shelving info' set to 'Columns')

address_format.label: Address format
address_format.comment:
Structure: {if X}{X},|{/if X}
Can use:
{prefix}{name}{suffix}{company}{street}{city}
{region} - uses state abbreviation if available, else full name
{region_full} - uses full state name
{region_code} - uses state abbreviation only
{postcode}{country}
(| = line break)

address_countryskip.label: Hide 'country name' for this country :
address_countryskip.comment: eg. put your country, then only overseas orders will have country added

capitalize_label_yn.label: Capitalise shipping labels?
capitalize_label_yn.comment: According to the USPS all addresses should be capitalised to improve delivery time and accuracy

pickpack_picklogo.label: Show logo on Pick Lists?
pickpack_picklogo.comment: Uses header logo from Packing Sheet

font_color_header.label: Header titles : Color
font_color_header.comment: Blank = darkOliveGreen (enter any HTML color name)

font_color_body.label: Page Body : Color
font_color_body.comment: Default = Black (enter any HTML color name)

background_color_product.label: Packing Sheet Products : Separating Line Color

non_standard_characters.label: Product names or attributes contain non-roman characters?
non_standard_characters.comment: This will load an extra font file to show these characters correctly - this will result in a much larger PDF file, so if you don't need to see these characters then leave set to 'No'.

pickpack_split_supplier_yn.label: Filter by supplier?
pickpack_split_supplier_yn.comment: This will create different pick lists per supplier

pickpack_supplier_attribute.label: Supplier attribute
pickpack_supplier_attribute.comment: Attribute code for supplier data; default : supplier

pickpack_supplier_login.label: Supplier username:suppliername
pickpack_supplier_login.comment: Output only these suppliers (Hide/Grey-out others) . . . Leave blank to auto-split all suppliers . . . enter magento-username:supplier-attribute;magento-usernameB:supplier-attributeB;admin(your-username):all;

pickpack_supplier_options.label: Supplier options
pickpack_supplier_options.comment: If supplier 'logged in', do what with other suppliers products?

column_mapping.label: Column mapping
column_mapping.comment:
Follow this format:
column-name:magento-attribute-a;
column-name-2:[fixed text here];
column-name-3:%%special_attribute_here%%;
--------------------
You can use these:
%%order_id%%, %%sku%%, %%qty%%, %%product_name%%, %%unit_price%%, %%shipping_address%%, %%description%%
